content: {"locationId": "9922", "organizationId": "8012", "name": "Heart & Hand Community Services Center", "address1": "212 D St", "address2": "", "city": "South Charleston", "state": "WV", "zipCode": "25303", "country": null, "phone": "304-744-6741", "phoneExt": "", "website": null, "latitude": "38.36484", "longitude": "-81.69334", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "www.hhomwv.org       Heart+Hand Outreach Ministries \u2013 South Charleston, WV      For 60 years, Heart+Hand Outreach Ministries has been a beacon of hope and assistance for individuals and families in need. Our mission is to empower and uplift our community by providing essential resources such as food, clothing, financial assistance, and supportive programs that foster self-sufficiency.Our main location in South Charleston, WV, serves as a hub for community outreach, offering:A food pantry stocked with nutritious options, A clothing closet providing free apparel for all ages, Emergency financial assistance for rent and utilities, Programs like re+Connect, which supports individuals in reentry and recovery, A community garden & seed library, promoting food security and sustainability. In addition to our South Charleston headquarters, we also have a satellite office inside Winfield United Methodist Church, serving all of Putnam County. This location extends our mission, ensuring that families in the region have access to the same vital services and support.Through compassion, collaboration, and community partnerships, we are dedicated to making a lasting impact. Together, we can build a stronger, healthier, and more resilient community.Learn more, get involved, or support our mission today!", "notes": "", "contactName": "Keshia Neal", "contactPhone": "304-744-6741", "contactEmail": "heartandhandsc@hhomwv.org", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Accepts Walk-Ins, Indoor Service, Lifting / Carrying Assistance, Pre-Packed Boxes / Bags", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "Diapers, Fruits & Vegetables, Household Products, Meat, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods, Toiletries / Hygiene Products", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 69, "regionName": "Facing Hunger Foodbank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "d6cdcac7-64e3-45cc-9c4f-b501fa20b650.png", "website": "https://facinghunger.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Eastern Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "ET", "offsetHours": "-4", "schedules": ["Monday 10:00 AM-12:00 PM", "Monday 1:00 PM-3:00 PM", "Tuesday 10:00 AM-12:00 PM", "Tuesday 1:00 PM-3:00 PM", "Wednesday 10:00 AM-12:00 PM", "Wednesday 1:00 PM-3:00 PM", "Thursday 10:00 AM-12:00 PM", "Thursday 1:00 PM-3:00 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
